titleStmt.title: Good-ale monopolized, and the tapsters persecuted: or Iustice, right, or wrong.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, S. (Samuel)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rob. Goodfellow about Midsummer moon.,

notesStmt.note: Signed: By Raphael Desmos [an anagram of the author's name?], in behalf of his brethren.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Alderm: Tichborne July. 14".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
